reviewText: I purchased this product online at Amazon.com. It was very reasonably priced. I also purchased two extra of these for my familyOlder Adults Walk and Firm I am loosing weight using the video several times a week. You will get a very good complete work out. I also ordered three other dvd's of Leslie Sansone's which you walk off the pounds. She has many walking videos that are done right in front of your tv. She makes exercise more fun never boring. I recomend her videos to my family and friends. We all need exercise, so why not have fun doing exercises. She is easy to follow and explains all the walk steps which are easy to learn.
